entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
